name: BLOB Defense Simulation
description:
4 days game jam #6: BLOB Defense Simulation

Stylized flight simulation, with combat!

Pilot a simulated helicopter. Battle invading forces. Prevent blobs from destroying the city

Controller required to play

  • Left Stick: Tilt helicopter
  • Right Stick: Rotate helicopter
  • Right Trigger: Accelerate propeller
  • Left Trigger: Decelerate propeller
  • West Button: Fire machine gun
  • North Button: Fire missiles

Hold Right Trigger to Accelerate upwards, the chopper should be rising when propeller force reaches 1500

"Tilt" and "Rotate" need to be used together to move the chopper nicely

The control system has a self-balancing mechanic that pulls the chopper back to horizontal rotation.

  • Holding Left Shoulder: Disable self-balance
  • The chopper is able to perform more risky maneuver with self-balance turned off.

Camera:

  • Right Stick while holding Right Shoulder: Rotate camera
